name: task-master
description: config/     connection.js - set up mongodb connection models/     User.js      Project.js - has a reference to the user with Schema.Types.ObjectId     Task.js - has a reference to the project with Schema.Types.ObjectId routes/     index.js - routes to apiRoutes     api/         index.js - has the routes to different routers         userRoutes.js -          projectRoutes.js - needs auth middleware on all routes         taskRoutes.js - needs auth middleware partially, as some routes are children to projectRoutes utils/     auth.js - middleware to authenticate user server.js
